data.name: Impostor Factory - AU Playbook
data.detailed_description:
---------------------------------------------------------------
Make your favorite characters say the worst things.

Or the nicest. You decide.
---------------------------------------------------------------

Have you heard of the Many-Worlds theory? It says that somewhere out there, there exists a reality where your favorite Freebird character is about to say the very thing you're about to type.

Alternate Universe Playbook is a software that allows you to view that reality.

With an intuitive and simple interface, AUP allows the whole community to create and write scenes using ready-made character portraits & backgrounds, then easily capture, record, and share them. If you're an art deity, adding your own custom portraits and characters is also as simple as dragging your own drawings to the folder.

*Note: This program is currently still under development, and further changes may occur. Side effects may include constipation from being stuck on writing dialogue. Please feel free to report any other issues you may find.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium III 800 MHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024x768 High Color +
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectXÂ®: 9.0+
